column2: ENGLISH

Oh it's just something about [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetFirstName] that I can't get off my mind. [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetHerHisCap] hair, the way [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetSheHe] moves. I'm getting all worked up just thinking about [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetHerHim] again.
What would it be like to hold [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetHerHim]?
[bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetSheHeCap] is the one for me.
If I see [bornthisway_gay_crush_target.GetHerHim] again we'll have some fun.
I shouldn't. It's a sin.
I've struggled to hide my desires, but I just can't do it anymore. I have to stop lying to myself.
I've struggled to hide my desires for other men, but I can't seem to rid myself of them. Maybe I should just accept that this is who I am.
I've struggled to hide my desires for other women, but I can't seem to rid myself of them. Maybe I should just accept that this is who I am.
I've struggled to hide my desires for other [Root.GetMenWomen], but I can't seem to rid myself of them. Maybe I should just accept that this is who I am.
I love men!
I love women!
I love [Root.GetMenWomen]!
I renounce my vow of celibacy!
No! I must resist these urges!
The mental strain will take its toll...
As hard as I've tried, I have not been able to control my unnatural lust for [Root.GetMenWomen]. There's only one way to rid myself of it for good...
AAAAAGH!
I must control this unnatural lust, but I cannot resist the beauty of men...\n\n"And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out."
